quest.name: Adventurers and Admirers
journal: The earnest adventurer is staring wide-eyed at you.
objectives: Search for the seasoned adventurer near Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.
Speak with the earnest adventurer in the Firmament.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: B-By the Twelve, you're Forename Surname! That we should stumble into you here of all places!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: Ah, apologies for getting carried away. It's just...we've been wanting to meet you for a very long time.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: We're adventurers too, you see. Ever since we witnessed your bout with Hoary Boulder, we've been admirers of yours. We've even taken on the odd mission for the Scions.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: With one of our comrades being Ishgardian, we also joined the fray at the Steps of Faith. There, we saw you again in combat, and it'd be no overstatement to say that you carried the battle.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: And then you went on to put an end to the entire war! Owing to which, our friend decided to return home. She's now hard at work helping with the restoration effort.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: They say that all are welcome to aid in the rebuilding, regardless of origin. Are you participating too, by any chance?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: So you are, so you are!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: If that's the case, then perhaps you've seen our comrade. We've come to pay her a visit, you see, but we're struggling to find her on account of being unfamiliar with the city...

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERC03838
dialogue.text: If you happen to see her, won't you let her know that we're here? She's Elezen...which isn't saying much in these parts, but adventurers can tell each other apart, isn't that right?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: Being quite tall, I thought that it would be easy to spot our friend. But then most everyone here is tall...

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: We've searched more or less all of Ishgard by now. Except the area over by Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral, perhaps.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: <gasp> Do my eyes deceive? Can it truly be Forename Surname!?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERC03838
dialogue.text: I say, are you not Forename Surname!?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: Why, you're the hero of the Scions! Allow me to thank you for your part in protecting my homeland!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: What business brings you to the Holy See this day, if I may ask?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: My comrades are in the Firmament, you say? What joyous tidings! I will seek them out at once! If it please you, will you not join me?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: It has been too long, my friends!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: Thanks for finding her!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERC03838
dialogue.text: You truly have a hero's sense of direction!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: All this time, and we've had nary a word from you! We thought you had forgotten about us!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: Forgive me, the restoration work has kept me busy, but I couldn't be gladder to see you all.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: And to have the great Forename present for our reunion makes the moment all the more special.

dialogue.name: HWDCITIZEN03838
dialogue.text: (-???-)Adventurer, adventurer!

dialogue.name: HWDCITIZEN03838
dialogue.text: Oh, you're all adventurers... <gasp> And even the savior of Ishgard is here!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: This good lady and her family have been kind to me. Is something the matter, my lady?

dialogue.name: HWDCITIZEN03838
dialogue.text: Of late, a strange creature has been prowling about the New Nest. I'm worried what it might do...

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERB03838
dialogue.text: This sounds like a job for us. It'd be our first outing all together in a while!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: Very well, let us take ourselves to the New Nest and look for this creature at once. If you have a spare moment, Forename, perhaps you'd care to attend to this task with us?

dialogue.name: HWDCITIZEN03838
dialogue.text: It was around here that I saw it...

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: There!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: You don't appear to be much of a threat...but if you mean ill, you will answer to us!

dialogue.name: UDEKIKI
dialogue.text: <click> <click> S-Stay your weapon! I am not an enemy!

dialogue.name: UDEKIKI
dialogue.text: No, I am an adventurer like you. The deftarm, I am called, and I came to the Firmament to work. I even have the necessary permit!

dialogue.name: UDEKIKI
dialogue.text: Ah, Master! What luck that you are here! Please, tell them that I pose no danger!

dialogue.name: HWDCITIZEN03838
dialogue.text: One of the friendly Vath who dwell in the Dravanian forelands, you say?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: I acted impulsively. Pray forgive me my discourtesy.

dialogue.name: UDEKIKI
dialogue.text: <click> <click> No harm was done.

dialogue.name: UDEKIKI
dialogue.text: If all is settled, then I will take my leave. There is much work to be done! Yes, much work indeed!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, we were able to avert a misunderstanding.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERC03838
dialogue.text: If what the fellow said is true, there's plenty of work in Ishgard for the willing. What do you say we stay for a spell?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03838
dialogue.text: Truly? To have all of you here would please me to no end!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERA03838
dialogue.text: And there you have it! We'll stay here a while and apply ourselves as we continue striving to follow your example!
